alert.note: Alert for Cook; Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 9:30PM CDT until July 14 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lake County in northeastern Illinois... North central Cook County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arlington Heights, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Palatine, Hoffman Estates, Buffalo Grove, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Highland Park, Vernon Hills, Zion, Libertyville, Lake Zurich, Lake Forest, Deerfield, Prospect Heights, Beach Park and Glencoe. Including the following interstates... I-94 between mile markers 12 and 30. I-294 between mile markers 12 and 30. This includes... Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Lake Forest College, and Ravinia Music Festival. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
